page.title: 15WEST SCUNTHORPE SCHOOLS (1)
page.content: Three schools share a campus in area known as the{Berkeley Estate}(named after local landowner,Sir Berkeley Sheffield){.Berkeley Junior,Berkeley {Infant}and{St. Augustine Webster {Primary}(R.C.)The latter was named after a monk of Carthusian Order who died as a martyr for R.C.faith. Perimeter of the campus is 1671m. Each school has a tarmac_surfaced playground.The remaining area is grassed with occasional trees and bushes.There are 4 football pitches,2 running tracks and 4 netball courts on campus. { St. Augustine Webster Primary},built 1966,is flat roofed & single storied.There are 12 classrooms(11 classes) 371 pupils,14 teachers (inc. Head).Av.class size is 35.276 children travel by bus or car.Uniform is worn by all pupils.
